content.description:
Quid primum deserta querar? Comitemne sororem

sprevisti moriens? Eadem me ad fata vocasses:

idem ambas ferro dolor, atque cadem hora tulisset.
content.question: Name one specific thing that the speaker wishes for in lines 2-3 (Eadem . . . tulisset).

frqParts.text: Name one specific thing that the speaker wishes for in lines 2-3 (Eadem . . . tulisset).

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
